display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=d1E-hV7evz8Q7kNvwGllARP&_nc_oc=AdnqlEEIRBL4SShGPzeAI_-6Zwdgz2DE0Mq-VDKiXbafqRLP_giWn1-WHifi1Yk2ejg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=1Qt2shijUFC9mrVrwL4YCQ&oh=00_Afv0LDAZZEyiZHCohWKsa7viCf2nh3Fhs4iexNTKJ1eN8w&oe=6995539D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=LH32nexktZkQ7kNvwGUCda3&_nc_oc=AdmegC7H7JkdsZNXOxoL26MRkdVCtWnIpOOKWpmQMHuQnkQFNnWrcJ51J6vEMagk-wM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=1Qt2shijUFC9mrVrwL4YCQ&oh=00_Aft91KErQo6iY1o1P_dA3D8EdPrcUR3SyfgjfKVr-NxLtw&oe=69953552)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=jONAIeP2hDoQ7kNvwETtVqS&_nc_oc=AdncJaXfUrC4e7HW577ewszsECBO_xjXlERwJeCyadQn_nnkX1aVXjDlk3ay7dmMPuM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=1Qt2shijUFC9mrVrwL4YCQ&oh=00_AfvtwBh1eYLzX8aqhKcbfaSdOQ__b8fDpL8xiA10Vot-tA&oe=69953B63)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=MOzRAUaQh9gQ7kNvwEueTPw&_nc_oc=AdlxtSyf1xROaPVvA4sjWPU9pA-dx0anNR-bwcN9k4JO8SI3DLUNcCCzgcZ4D4Yoens&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=1Qt2shijUFC9mrVrwL4YCQ&oh=00_AftcKZmZ9ztLezZqxbP9GAZ0aD9OozJfUoAVv5YqRv5bmQ&oe=699531EE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=RJjJLVhE07QQ7kNvwG1XN25&_nc_oc=AdlbYhjC_37YBpG_8RJ9w2ULzHvSk_gNX6dpp7mvk6TZh0lrwh27W9YB_6IoSdgH-Fk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=1Qt2shijUFC9mrVrwL4YCQ&oh=00_AfuyBaKtL1HmvtEjA4Nja_bA7OjFaM9NqlfpRFqTDWWtmw&oe=699539D6)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
